v subscript A over v subscript B equals fraction numerator begin display style tan open parentheses theta subscript A close parentheses end style over denominator tan open parentheses theta subscript B close parentheses end fraction equals fraction numerator begin display style tan open parentheses 30 degree close parentheses end style over denominator tan open parentheses 60 degree close parentheses end fraction equals fraction numerator begin display style bevelled fraction numerator 1 over denominator square root of 3 end fraction end style over denominator square root of 3 end fraction equals 1 third
